### About me

I am a PhD Candidate under <a href="https://www.rensvandeschoot.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Rens van de Schoot</a> at the department of Methodology & Statistics of Utrecht University in the Netherlands. On this website you can find information on some of the current projects that I am working on and information on past work. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or comments.
